name: RestRequest

fields.name: headers
fields.description: Returns the headers that are received by the request.

fields.name: httpMethod
fields.description: Returns one of the supported HTTP request methods.

fields.name: params
fields.description: Returns the parameters that are received by the request.

fields.name: remoteAddress
fields.description: Returns the IP address of the client making the request.

fields.name: requestBody
fields.description: Returns or sets the body of the request.

fields.name: requestURI
fields.description: Returns or sets everything after the host in the HTTP request string.

fields.name: resourcePath
fields.description: Returns the REST resource path for the request.
